name: French for the Workplace
description: Students will accomplish a variety of professional tasks and develop effective oral and written communication skills as well as acquire a deeper knowledge of the culture of the workplace in French-speaking communities: magazines, internet, video-clips.  Emphasis on the study of professional terminology, correspondence formulae and professional practices of the workplace
prerequisites: FSL221Y (63%) or, upon first FRE/FSL, enrolment equivalent as determined by the French Placement Test
